00019 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 // The majority of these functions have been derived and adapted from
00021 // examples given in the following excellent must-have procedural references:
00022 //
00023 //  "Texturing & Modeling: A Procedural Approach, 3rd Edition." by
00024 //  David Ebert, F. Kenton Musgrave, Darwin Peachey, Ken Perlin, Steve Worley,
00025 //  Morgan Kauffman, 2003.
00026 //
00027 //  "Advanced RenderMan: Creating CGI for Motion Picture",
00028 //  by Anthony A. Apodaca and Larry Gritz, Morgan Kaufmann, 1999.
00029 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030
